title: Any other buildings which may be less than 30 years of age but which by reasons of dis- repair or be
clause_text: Any other buildings which may be less than 30 years of age but which by reasons of dis- repair or because of structural / sanitary defects, are unfit for human habitation or by reasons of their bad or sub-optimal configuration or the narrowness of streets are dangerous or injurious to the health or safety of the inhabitants of the area, as certified by the (1) by the Designated Officer appointed by Municipal Commissioner or as per theRegulation of Redevelopment of Dilapidated Buildings;
